hero.headline: The All-in-One OS for Your Restaurant
hero.subheadline: Manage orders, tables, billing, and staff from a single intuitive dashboard. Built for speed and reliability.

features.title: Unified Order Management
features.description: Never miss an order. View dine-in, delivery, and takeaway orders in one single, real-time dashboard.

features.title: Billing Made Simple
features.description: Generate bills, split payments, and handle taxes with ease. Supports multiple payment methods including UPI and Cards.

features.title: Menu Control Center
features.description: Update your menu on the fly. Mark items out of stock or update prices instantly across all devices.

reviews.author: Sarah Jenkins
reviews.text: Cravings transformed how we handle orders during rush hour. The digital menu is a lifesaver!

reviews.author: David Chen
reviews.text: The best investment we made this year. Customers love scanning the code and ordering directly.

reviews.author: Emily Rodriguez
reviews.text: Insanely easy to update. We change our specials daily and it takes seconds.

reviews.author: Michael Chang
reviews.text: Inventory management is finally under control. We cut wastage by 20% in the first month.

reviews.author: Priya Patel
reviews.text: Marketing tools are powerful. The automated campaigns brought back so many old customers.

faq.question: Does it work offline?
faq.answer: We are working on offline capabilities. Currently, a stable internet connection is recommended for real-time sync.

faq.question: Can I use it on a tablet?
faq.answer: Yes! The POS is fully responsive and optimized for iPads, Android tablets, and desktop computers.

faq.question: Is training required?
faq.answer: Our interface is designed to be intuitive. Most staff members learn it in under 15 minutes.
